item.title: A Ridiculous Day
item.description: Today’s been a day of a lot of ridiculous all over the board.

item.title: Code, Why Are You Like This?
item.description: And of course, no sooner than I finished my previous post and decided to deploy the site than I ran into a bunch of problems, some bigger than others.
